document_title: Vocal cord nodules: Symptoms and treatments
subsection_content: Vocal cord fibroids or vocal cord fibroids are a condition in which small fibrous particles appear on both sides of the vocal cords. They usually have wide legs, located in the middle ⅓ of the vocal cords, are similar in size and often grow symmetrically. This vocal cord disease often appears in occupations that require the use of the voice a lot with high frequency and intensity, especially singers, teachers, hosts, salesmen, etc. This is considered a sequela of long-term chronic laryngitis without proper treatment. The disease is more common in women than men.(1)
subsection_title: hat xo day thanh quan.json. What are vocal cord nodules?
subsection_data:
hat xo day thanh quan.json. What are vocal cord nodules?
Vocal cord fibroids or vocal cord fibroids are a condition in which small fibrous particles appear on both sides of the vocal cords. They usually have wide legs, located in the middle ⅓ of the vocal cords, are similar in size and often grow symmetrically. This vocal cord disease often appears in occupations that require the use of the voice a lot with high frequency and intensity, especially singers, teachers, hosts, salesmen, etc. This is considered a sequela of long-term chronic laryngitis without proper treatment. The disease is more common in women than men.(1)
